<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points but not immediately killed.

</column>

---

Fierceness in battle runs through your blood, and you refuse to fall from your injuries. You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point, and your [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition increases by 1.

<title level="2">Orc Ferocity leads to...</title>
[Defy Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=2416), [Ferocious Beasts](/Feats.aspx?ID=1292), [Incredible Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=90), [Rampaging Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1294), [Undying Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1291)
name: Orc Ferocity
